prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a long, serpentine body and elegant fins.
I want a blue dragon Pokemon that has fluffy ears and a graceful tail.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a mythical sea serpent with shimmering scales.
Make a beautiful Pokemon that embodies the essence of calm water and gentle breezes.
Imagine a sleek dragon Pokemon that glides through the skies with ease.
Design a majestic Dragon-type Pokemon with a smooth, flowing appearance and elegant features.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of a water serpent and a mystical creature.
